item.name: Veeam Backup Service
item.description: Manages scheduled jobs, serves Enterprise Manager requests.

item.name: Veeam Backup Catalog Data Service
item.description: Manages and replicates guest OS file system index data files.

item.name: Veeam Backup Service - V9.X
item.description: Manages scheduled jobs, serves Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager requests.

item.name: Veeam Broker Service - V9.X
item.description: Interacts with virtual infrastructure to collect and cache its topology.

item.name: Veeam Guest Catalog Service - V9.X
item.description: Manages and replicates guest OS file system index data files.

item.name: Veeam Cloud Connect Service - V9.X
item.description: Provides transparent connection to cloud resources over secure SSL/TLS channel.

item.name: Veeam Installer Service
item.description: Manages scheduled jobs, serves Enterprise Manager requests.

item.name: Veeam Installer Service - V9.X
item.description: Enables installing, updating and configuring Veeam Backup & Replication components.

item.name: Veeam Hyper-V Integration Service - V9.X
item.description: Enables Veeam Backup & Replication to perform on-host and off-host processing of Hyper-V virtual machines.

item.name: Veeam Mount Service - V9.X
item.description: Mounts Veeam backups and replicas for file-level access.

item.name: Veeam vPower NFS Service - V9.X
item.description: Implements vPower NFS server that enables running virtual machines directly from backup files.

item.name: Veeam Remote Tape Access Service
item.description: Manages scheduled jobs, serves Enterprise Manager requests.

item.name: Veeam Data Mover Service - V9.X
item.description: Sends and receives virtual machines data.

item_prototype.name: Nombre de VM dans le travail {#JOBNAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Le travail VEEAM {#JOBNAME} est toujours en cours d'exécution (8h)
Moins de 2Gb restant sur le repository {#REPONAME}
Le travail VEEAM {#JOBTAPENAME} est toujours en cours d'exécution (8h)
Pas de récupération de données depuis 24h

trigger.expression: {Template VEEAM-BACKUP trapper:service_state[Veeam Backup Catalog Data Service].last()}>0
trigger.name: Veeam Backup Catalog Data Service is down on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template VEEAM-BACKUP trapper:service_state[Veeam Backup and Replication Service].last()}>0
trigger.name: Veeam Backup Service is down on {HOST.NAME}

Veeam V9.X Guest Catalog Service is down on {HOST.NAME}
Veeam V9.X Hyper-V Integration Service is down on {HOST.NAME}
Veeam V9.X Installer Service V9 is down on {HOST.NAME}
Veeam V9.X Mount Service is down on {HOST.NAME}
Veeam V9.X vPower NFS Service is down on {HOST.NAME}
